entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

entry.title: AviralJain32/xeno-mini-crm-frontend: Xeno Mini CRM is a lightweight, AI-enhanced customer engagement platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It enables marketing teams to create audience segments, run personalized campaigns, and leverage Google Gemini AI

entry.title: Rakshan-VP/UAV-Simulator: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
entry.content: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
